packets.name: Dreamverse Explorer hat
packets.author: ToxSam
packets.description:
This hat is from an age when humans relied on their imagination to create and explore different realities through lucid dreams. The Dreamverse was once a layered reality sustained by dormant humans, creating a massive hive dream. Humans left their inner universes and decided to evolve in their waking state, only a few remain using the old ways of connecting with each other.
With the hat on, you will be able to enter the dreams of someone sleeping, but be careful to leave their mind before they wake up, or you'll have a hard time coming back.
